animeDescription: Atsuko and Sayaka think they have it made when they are both accepted into the same prestigious women`s academy. There, they will be free to explore the intense passion of their relationship, unbounded. But when the mystical bonds imprisoning a hideous ancient evil that feeds on the lust of nubile women are accidentally broken, the two young lovers soon learn they have more to fear than final exams.
animeStaff: [['Iwakura, Kazunori', 'Character Design'], ['Iino, Toshiaki', 'Key Animation'], ['Ikeda, Yuuji', 'Key Animation'], ['Ishii, Hisashi', 'Key Animation']]
